attributes.action: Stop the Gary McKinnon case and allow him a peacfull life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sorry to have to write this email but i am totally appalled by the way Gary McKinnon is being treated and i wish i could do something to help him stay in the country rather than being extradited for a crime that has not even hurt anyone! Please respond and help Gary.

rejection.details: The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
